data.message: Woah One Billion wow what an amazing milestone this must truly be. Facebook I wanted you to know how genuinely glad and happy I am to be a part of this amazing moment in our time it's an honour really. We love you Facebook thanks for giving us all that you guys have put into this to bring us the privilege of connecting, interacting and socialising with one another in this unique way which wasn't available to us before, our social lives are on top of their game now more than ever, I think it's pretty awesome how you guys had an idea and implemented it so elegantly   making the impossible possible that really Is something, it's a huge motivator showing that anything is possible as long as you believe. Thank you guys for creating wonders giving us this gift of finding one another, changing our lives and for letting me be part of this historical event. What you gave us and we all build together planet Facebook is magnificent. I'm glad to say we made history together :) Soon One day I belive a billion people will be listen to my songs aswell which I hope will bring them love and peace. Thanks for your support and love guys! :) Facebook

replies.message: You're making us blush, Danial. We really appreciate all the love. We're so glad you're part of our community! -Kate
nezelim strane osobe na svojoj stranici
